# The bz2 extension

Configure the `bz2` extension.

This extension provides support for reading and writing BZip2 (.bz2) compressed
files.

## PHP_EXT_BZ2

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_BZ2_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
